content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Rejection] I apologize, but since we didn't agree on a final price, I can't provide you with a number.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Rejection] I apologize, but since I can't provide a specific outcome, I can't provide you with a satisfaction rating.
name: Peter Schmidt
